name: Atom's Champion
descriptions: Atom's Champion is a non-hostile feral ghoul reaver found in the Holy Light Monastery in the Fallout 3 add-on Broken Steel. Atom's Champion is one of two non-hostile feral ghouls in the monastery, the other being Sun of Atom.
This feral ghoul reaver is being used by the Apostles of the Eternal Light as an example of one who has given himself over to the Eternal Light and achieved salvation and Enlightenment.
He will attack if any of the people in the Holy Light Monastery are killed or if the cult is threatened via dialogue.
Atom's Champion appears only in the Fallout 3 add-on Broken Steel.
